title: Trump to appear at Charlie Kirk memorial. See photos and video.
shortDescription: The memorial in Charlie Kirk's home state of Arizona will see speakers including President Donald Trump and other conservative figures.

title: Trump approval poll: See where president stands on crime, immigration
shortDescription: A majority of Americans disapprove of President Donald Trump's job performance, according to a new poll.

title: Donald Trump pressures Pam Bondi on investigations into political foes
shortDescription: Trump took to social media to pressure his attorney general to move forward on investigations into three of his adversaries.

title: Charlie Kirk memorial service: Trump, Vance to address mourners
shortDescription: Mourners are gathering in Arizona for a memorial service honoring the life of slain conservative activist Charlie Kirk.

title: Trump administration cancels survey tracking American food insecurity
shortDescription: The Trump administration has canceled the USDA’s annual food insecurity survey, ending an effort to track how many Americans struggle to access enough food.

title: DOJ investigated Trump border czar Tom Homan for possible bribery
shortDescription: Neither the White House nor the Department of Justice denied in statements that a probe of Homan had occurred.

title: Trump says Letitia James probe prosecutor 'didn’t quit, I fired him!'
shortDescription: Trump said he fired Erik Siebert and withdrew his nomination for U.S. attorney — hours after the prosecutor resigned.

title: Trump seeks $100,000 fees on H-1B visas. Big tech could be impacted.
shortDescription: Jobs tend to be concentrated in STEM fields, and workers overwhelmingly come from India.

title: Democrats demand meeting with Trump as shutdown deadline nears
shortDescription: Democratic leaders in Congress are demanding a meeting with Trump a a day after the Senate struck down a funding bill to avert a government shutdown.

title: States concerned Trump will dismantle FEMA
shortDescription: As Trump administration considers closing FEMA, states prepare for future

title: Trump makes early midterm moves amid GOP concerns about enthusiasm
shortDescription: The party in power typically loses congressional seats in the midterms, leaving Trump fighting an uphill battle to protect GOP majorities.

title: Trump offers $1M gold card for immigrants
shortDescription: President Donald Trump unveiled the $1 million 'gold card' and higher H1-B fees, claiming it will reduce taxes and debt.

title: Trump offers $1 million 'gold cards,' creates $100,000 H-1B visa fee
shortDescription: The visa fees are part of Trump's strategy to favor U.S. over foreign-born workers, as part of a larger crackdown on immigration.

title: Trump asks SCOTUS to end deportation protections for Venezuelans
shortDescription: The Trump administration wants to end a program that allows some Venezuelans to live and work temporarily in the United States.

title: Trump to add $100,000 fee for H-1B worker visas
shortDescription: The president intends to limit use of H-1B visas, which allow skilled laborers from other countries to work in the US.
